Griels Quest for the Holy Porron

by MoonWatcherMD

Released Jul 25, 2018
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

The gameplay is similar both to Soukoban and the Lolo games, though the focus is not on moving boxes around. Instead, you are a knight who must pick up magic objects to vanquish evil creatures.
